title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park      Support Fort Frederica National Monument by purchasing items in our bookstore run by the Fort Frederica association, or by volunteering at the park itself.  Â    Donations:  All donations to Fort Frederica, stay within the park and are used to support visitor related programs such as special events, living history demonstrations, and other interpretive activities.  Donations can be made to the park via a check made out to "National Park Service" and mailed to:  Fort Frederica National Monument 6515 Frederica Road St. Simons Island, GA  31522
